Song.title: Majesty
Song.copyright: Martin Smith | Stuart Garrard Â© 2003, 2004 Curious? Music UK (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: H[Am]ere I [Fmaj7]am H[C/E]umbled by Your maje[Fmaj7]sty Co[C/E]vered by Your grace so f[G/B]ree [E/G#] H[Am]ere I [Fmaj7]am Kn[C/E]owing I'm a sinful [Fmaj7]man Co[C/E]vered by the blood of the L[G/B]amb [E/G#]
PRE-CHORUS: N[Am]ow [G/B]I've fo[C]und the greatest love of [Am]all [G/B]is m[C]ine Since You laid down Your l[D/F#]ife The greatest sacrif[F]ice [G7/F F G7/F]
Chorus 1: M[C]ajes[G]ty m[Am]ajes[F]ty Your gr[C]ace has found me just as I [G]am Empty-h[Am]anded but alive in Your h[F]ands
Verse 2: H[Am]ere I [Fmaj7]am H[C/E]umbled by the love that You g[Fmaj7]ive Forg[C/E]iven so that I can forg[G/B]ive [E/G#] H[Am]ere I [Fmaj7]stand K[C/E]nowing that I'm Your de[Fmaj7]sire S[C/E]anctified by glory and f[G/B]ire [E/G#]
Chorus 2: M[C]ajes[G]ty m[Am]ajes[F]ty For[C]ever I am changed by Your l[G]ove In the pres[Am]ence of Your maje[Fmaj7]sty majesty
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 here i am humbled by your majesty covered by your grace so free here i am knowing im a sinful man covered by the blood of the lamb prechorus now ive found the greatest love of all is mine since you laid down your life the greatest sacrifice chorus 1 majesty majesty your grace has found me just as i am emptyhanded but alive in your hands verse 2 here i am humbled by the love that you give forgiven so that i can forgive here i stand knowing that im your desire sanctified by glory and fire chorus 2 majesty majesty forever i am changed by your love in the presence of your majesty majesty
